mapper.sql: PUID, P_BRAND_CODE, P_BRAND_NAME, P_BRAND_CREATE_DATE, P_BRAND_LAST_MOD_DATE, P_BRAND_COMMENT
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_BRAND_RECORD (PUID, P_BRAND_CODE, P_BRAND_NAME, P_BRAND_CREATE_DATE, P_BRAND_LAST_MOD_DATE, P_BRAND_COMMENT) values (#{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pBrandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pBrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pBrandCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pBrandLastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pBrandComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update HZ_BRAND_RECORD set P_BRAND_CODE = #{pBrandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_BRAND_NAME = #{pBrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_BRAND_CREATE_DATE = #{pBrandCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_BRAND_LAST_MOD_DATE = #{pBrandLastModDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_BRAND_COMMENT = #{pBrandComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

P_BRAND_CODE = #{pBrandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
